oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A novel high power self-commutated static var compensator for load compensation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHATTERJEE, K
FERNANDES, BG
DUBEY, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: commutation
compensation
insulated gate bipolar transistors
power system harmonics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A novel high power self-commutated static VAr compensator for load compensation is proposed. The harmonics are eliminated by combining low frequency high power devices and high frequency low power devices. A modified control strategy is also proposed for applications involving high and faster rate of change in VAr demand. Detailed simulation studies for single phase and three phase topologies are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the International Conference on Power Electronics and Drive Systems (V 1), Singapore, 26-29 May 1997, 65-71
